Reviews.Title: Like it but has a few flaws
Reviews.Author: ACE1DRAGON
Reviews.Content: It is good to use in every location as long as it stays on but it dies very quickly even in standby mode. Wen it takes the movie is great but it shuts off quickly and no good after that. Good company to buy from. Very professional and helpful.

Reviews.Title: Great and convenient
Reviews.Author: S Molina
Reviews.Content: Camera at first had difficulty to get it set up write. The instruction manual is a bit misleading.Playing with it a bit a got it recording. Need Real Player to view recordings. Doing just fine!

Reviews.Title: Good for the price and size
Reviews.Author: Ricardo H. Jones "Ric"
Reviews.Content: Good tiny camera. Good for hiking. Perfect to have on hand for unexpected situations. Reealy small and with good image.

Reviews.Title: Good quality picture.
Reviews.Author: Roger A. Rose
Reviews.Content: Actually surprised at the video quality for less than $20.  I must say that the viewfinder is practically useless though.

Reviews.Title: Certainly not hd video
Reviews.Author: NE critter
Reviews.Content: Not even close to hd quality video. A waste of moneyVideo is very grainy,small and not what I expected from the ad

Reviews.Author: giorgi
Reviews.Content: it is not that item which I'd like. there is no 5 mp so, I'm very angry myself. thank you

Reviews.Title: minni dv 5mp worlds smallest
Reviews.Author: Dorinda Lord-Blake
Reviews.Content: I don't like this camera because it keeps shutting off. when I selected this camera I thought this was a motion controlled camera

Reviews.Title: No commit at this time
Reviews.Author: jyee808
Reviews.Content: havent used the product yet.  need more time before i really commit on it.  need 6 more words before i can submit...lol unreal

ProductInfo.Features:
Functions: camera, video recorder, sound recorder, and webcam
Video resolution: 1280 x 960; Picture resolution: up to 5mp
Supports Micro SD/TF card up to 16GB (not included)
Size: 1.8"x1.1"x0.4"/4.5x2.9x1cm
Package Contents: 1 x Mini DVR,  1 x USB charging cable, 1 x USB data transfer cable, 1 x emergency charger
ProductInfo.Name: Mini Dv 5MP Worlds Smallest HD Digital Video Camera Spy Camera Video Recorder Hidden Cam DV DVR with 1280 x 960 Resolution
